content.question: Which of the following best describes the data in the line graph?

choices.label: There were twice as many exports as imports in China in 2003.
Both exports and imports decreased between 2007 and 2008.
The value of Chinese exports was almost equal to the value of its imports in 2001.

content.answer: The value of Chinese exports was almost equal to the value of its imports in 2001.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.1: Impact of Global Economic and Technological Forces
